document_data.name: Toad Knoll
document_data.mainbody: '''Toad Knoll''' was a hill in the [[Dalelands]] just north of the [[North Ride]].

Geography.Flora & Fauna: The hill took its name from the bumper crop of [[frog]]s and [[toad]]s that occurred in the spring months, living and breeding in the marshy ground at the base, caused by the upwelling of an intermittent natural spring..
